title: Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modification
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value of a report parameter in the list box, the default value is lost.
EB: The default value in the list box of a report parameter should not be lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'.
4. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK.
5. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
6. Modify the default value 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
7. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog to verify the persistence of the default value in the list box.
